generate_kernel_offsets(ndim: int, kernel_size: int | Tuple[int, ...], source_stride: int | Tuple[int, ...], dilation: int | Tuple[int, ...], layout: str = 'minuet')#

Generate the kernel weight offsets for SparseConv

Parameters:

  • ndim â€“ the dimension of each weight offset

  • kernel_size â€“ the kernel size of SparseConv

  • source_stride â€“ the tensor stride of the input

  • dilation â€“ the dilation of SparseConv

  • layout â€“ the layout of the sparse convolution, only minuet, minkowski, and torchsparse are supported

Returns:

a numpy array consists of the generated sparse convolution
